archimate:Requirement.name: TS.2.1.3f: f) storing cryptographic keys for encrypted information that has a defined retention period (e.g. due to a legal or regulatory requirement) for long enough to ensure that information can be decrypted within the retention period.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
